page.title: 15Newcastle Cultural Provision
page.content: Newcastle is proud of its cultural amenities; prices are lower than in London and travelling distances much less.The North East's regional orchestra is the{Northern Sinfonia,} whilst orchestras such as the Berlin Philharmonic visit the City Hall regularly.The{Theatre Royal}in Grey Street is a major venue for touring companies such as Sadlers Wells and Scottish and Northern Opera. Classic and experimental films are shown at the{Tyneside Cinema}in Northumberland Street and poetry readings are held at{Mordin Tower.}The major regional theatre company is based at the Playhouse(Haymarket);arts and crafts are catered for at the Side,the{Polytechnic}and the{Laing Art {Galleries.}There are annual festivals for jazz,films and folk music,as well as a literary festival.
